Plenum-rated cable.2: Fire-rated cable jacket; Fluorinated ethylene polymer (FEP) or low-smoke polyvinyl chloride (PVC)
Plenum-rated cable.3: Plenum-rated cable may not be as flexible; May not have the same bend radius
Plenum-rated cable.4: Worst-case planning; Important concerns for any structure

Abbreviations.4: Braided shielding around the entire cable and foil around the pairs is S/FTP
Abbreviations.5: Foil around the cable and no shielding around the pairs is F/UTP

Coaxial cables.1: Two or more forms share a common axis
Coaxial cables.2: RG-6 used in television/digital cable; high-speed Internet over cable
Coaxial cables.3: RG-59 used as patch cables; Not designed for long distances
